name: Soularr
description: Soularr is a Python script that connects Lidarr with Soulseek via slskd. It automatically searches for and downloads music from Soulseek based on your Lidarr wanted list, then triggers Lidarr to import the completed downloads.
short_desc: Automated music downloads from Soulseek for Lidarr
author: mrusse

form_fields.label: Lidarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Get this from Lidarr: Settings > General > API Key

form_fields.label: Lidarr Host URL
form_fields.hint: Use localhost with the port Lidarr is exposed on (check Runtipi app settings)

form_fields.label: slskd API Key
form_fields.hint: Configure an API key in slskd's settings under Options > API Keys

form_fields.label: slskd Host URL
form_fields.hint: Use localhost with the port slskd is exposed on (check Runtipi app settings)

form_fields.label: Script Interval (seconds)
form_fields.hint: How often Soularr checks for new wanted albums

form_fields.label: Number of Albums to Grab
form_fields.hint: Maximum number of albums to process per run
